name: Startup Vision
description: High-level startup vision and market opportunity

checklist_items.label: Clear Startup Vision
checklist_items.description: User has articulated a clear, compelling startup vision

checklist_items.label: Market Opportunity
checklist_items.description: User has identified a significant market opportunity or problem

checklist_items.label: Founder Motivation
checklist_items.description: User has strong personal motivation and commitment to the idea

checklist_items.label: Unique Insight
checklist_items.description: User has a unique insight or approach to the problem

checklist_items.label: Scalability Potential
checklist_items.description: The idea has potential for significant scale and growth
